block.p: NEW YORK GOVERNMENT OFFICES Closed. POST OFFICE Closed except for main post office at 33rd Street and Eighth Avenue. BANKS Closed. PARKING Alternate-side regulations suspended. No-parking zone extends from West 34th Street to West 59th Street between the Avenue of the Americas and Eighth Avenue. SANITATION Normal pickups for garbage and recycling. No street cleanings. TRANSPORTATION City buses and subways on a Saturday schedule with additional service. Long Island Rail Road on weekend schedule with additional trains. Metro-North on a holiday schedule with extra trains.

NEW YORK GOVERNMENT OFFICES Closed. POST OFFICE Closed except for main post office at 33rd Street and Eighth Avenue. BANKS Closed. PARKING Alternate-side regulations suspended. No-parking zone extends from West 34th Street to West 59th Street between the Avenue of the Americas and Eighth Avenue. SANITATION Normal pickups for garbage and recycling. No street cleanings. TRANSPORTATION City buses and subways on a Saturday schedule with additional service. Long Island Rail Road on weekend schedule with additional trains. Metro-North on a holiday schedule with extra trains.
NEW JERSEY GOVERNMENT OFFICES Closed. POST OFFICE
Express Mail and special delivery only. BANKS Closed. TRANSPORTATION PATH trains on regular schedule. New Jersey Transit rail service will operate on a normal schedule with additional service.
CONNECTICUT GOVERNMENT OFFICES Closed. POST OFFICE
Express Mail and special delivery only. BANKS Closed. TRANSPORTATION Metro-North on a holiday schedule with extra trains.
